content: {"name": "Clayton Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Drive up pantry.\nEntrance and food line is on West Linden Street.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "110 South Delsea Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Clayton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08312", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.6536975, "longitude": -75.0912141}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 881-5454", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
